Where are you going?”

“Don't, don't just leave me!”

dialogStrings:
“I'm sorry, we're currently renovating.
Please come again.”

“I heard that this is the curator's
favorite attraction.
He even has his collection
displayed in the arena.”

“Are you here for the battle, too?”
{CHOICE}That's the idea
{CHOICE}Not interested

“I like fighters,
but hate ones who're all talk.”

“I watched you win eight battles.
I want you to have this!”
